scripts.dev:local: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec node  -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config --loader ts-paths-esm-loader --experimental-specifier-resolution=node  ./src/app.ts
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec node  -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config --loader ts-paths-esm-loader --experimental-specifier-resolution=node  ./src/test.ts
scripts.test:src2: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec node  -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config --loader ts-paths-esm-loader --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./src2/app.ts
